New Records: Bolivia broke the altitude record for an international fixture with their match at the Municipal de El Alto stadium
Key Match Events: Ramiro Vaca opened the scoring for Bolivia in the 13th minute with a long-range shot
Carmelo Algara√±az doubled the lead for Bolivia from the spot before the break
Miguel Terceros found the net early in the second half
Enzo Monteiro scored in the 89th to seal the win for Bolivia
Pre-Game Insights: The match was played at the Municipal de El Alto stadium at 4,150 metres above sea level
Post-Match Reflections: Bolivia's win moved them provisionally into international playoffs spot in seventh place with six points, just one behind Brazil
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of 20,000 fans
Bolivia's newly-appointed coach Oscar Villegas earned his first triumph at the helm
